foursquare API¶

venues API endpoint¶

GET https://api.foursquare.com/v2/venues/search?ll={lat},{lng}&client_id={CLEINT_ID}&client_secret={CLIENT_SECRET}&v=20150316¶

credentials to app can be found here:

https://de.foursquare.com/developers/app/VYFRCYBKV24XBIUAJJEFQW4ENIKSGRPBYBTOTQK5H0YNX4YO

Example response:

{
  "meta": {
    "code": 200
  },
  "response": {
    "venues": [
      {
        "id": "53db71e1498e2c14888150ef",
        "name": "Bułkę przez Bibułkę",

            "Zgody 3",
            "Poland"
          ]
        },
        "categories": [
          {
            "id": "4bf58dd8d48988d16d941735",
